response.overview: The grass and the hills shall break into singing / all the trees of this mud shall clap their hands / flowers shall flow and gather momentum / folding their bloom onto water and lands / the clouds in this river shall listen closely / to the sound of water taking licks from the sky / circles will grow from tongues in the making / passing gator and turtle and ducks as they fly / my word will be such that it goes out of my mouth / it shall speak to ears that will hear it / like a willing from far finding its way / until it can say I am near it / it shall burrow its way into the ground / up through a bush of flowers / riding the wind across heaths of grass / now with additional powers / gathering figure gathering ground / gathering earth and sky / gathering mortals gathering gods / and untying the tongues that tie / like a willing from far willing its way / willing a voice that says I
response.title: Will's Hill
